duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform janitorial duties and tasks as per the daily schedule
Provide work direction and assistance to custodians as directed by Custodial Supervisor
Assist Custodial Supervisor in scheduling, training, and maintaining equipment inventory
Maintain daily upkeep of assigned area and track supplies inventory
Perform quality, service, and safety inspections, and report incidents/hazardous conditions to Supervisor
Monitor employees for proper use of personal protective equipment and supplies, and provide corrective action as needed

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required
